lines.text:
[Last lines]
I'll bet they're going to be married.
Well, that finishes him as a secret service man.
Well, he won't be unable to keep a secret now.
From what I know of Bnncroft, he's the man for the job.

[to Bancroft]
You've been doing fine so far but don't be hasty. Remember that patience is the creed of the secret Serviv. It's like boxing. Don't lead, but make the other fellow come to you.

[to detective]
No so fast! Not so fast! Why, one word from me to the chief and that badge'll be as useless to you as a compass was to Corrigan.
